name: Monkeh I: The first one.
description: The original version of the acclaimed game "Monkeh II: A Space Adventure". Indeed, this game isn't very good as it's just what I made when I was learning Unity. But hey, if you happen to LOVE crappy games made by little lads who should still be outside playing tag, go ahead and give it a try. Okay, I'm just making excuses, I wasn't that young when I made this...
